short_summary: Acetal Sheets required for the Underwater Sensing Network nodes calibration fixture.
description: Public Service Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) — Atlantic Research Centre has a requirement to purchase and delivery of Six 2” Thick Acetal Sheets — 4ft x 10ft to build a modified version of the calibration fixture for the Underwater Sensing Network nodes to allow for better angular calibration.
full_summary:
### Government Notice
#### Tender Details

* **Notice Title** (English and French):
   - English: Acquisition of Node Calibration Fixture Materials - Acetal Sheets
   - French: Acquisition de matériaux de capacité d'étalonnage du nœud - Feuilles en acétal
* **Reference Number**: WS4585702058-Doc4631796849
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4585702058
* **Publication Date**: June 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 12, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Amendment Date**: July 9, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 14, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

**Notice Description**:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking tenders from qualified suppliers for the procurement of six 2” thick acetal sheets, measuring 4ft x 10ft, to build a modified calibration fixture for the Underwater Sensing Network nodes. The calibration fixture was designed in-house and will be constructed within the same department.

**Procurement Details**:
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (English) / Demande de Proposition (French)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Basis of Selection: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (English) / Marchandises (French)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity**:
* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Contact Person**:
* **Name**: Lyne Leger
* **Email**: lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (Not Provided)
* **Fax**: (Not Provided)

**Additional Information**:
The notice and tender documents can be accessed through Ariba at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19999067?extsite=MTk5OTkwNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19999067?extsite=MTk5OTkwNjdfQU4
